title: Minecraft Shurima
body:
http://i.imgur.com/YJseGtv.jpg

My first Minecraft League project

World download here: http://www.mediafire.com/download/zmhtqa88q2w372k/shurima.zip

replies.body:
Wowzers!  That's really impressive.  It really makes me yearn to be there.
What tools did you use, if at all?

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=72e20iaQ,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-03-19T06:55:15.012+0000)
>
> Wowzers!  That's really impressive.  It really makes me yearn to be there.
> What tools did you use, if at all?

I used Worldedit. Wouldn't build without it!

> [{quoted}](name=Heliostorm,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=72e20iaQ,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-03-19T06:59:50.326+0000)
>
> I used Worldedit. Wouldn't build without it!

That looks like a really powerful tool.  Also, I must commend you for your appropriate icon AND name!  ;)
I remember seeing a Crystal Scar for Minecraft and it looked better than the one in LoL xD
It is, I used to play MC and that was one of the best tools, of course, all it does is save time with copying and pasting blocks. So all the credit to the creator of this :)

> [{quoted}](name=Heliostorm,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=72e20iaQ,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-03-19T06:59:50.326+0000)
>
> I used Worldedit. Wouldn't build without it!

You cheater hahah
Do your next one vanilla, live in a world and collect materials that way

>
> You cheater hahah
> Do your next one vanilla, live in a world and collect materials that way

Survival Minecraft is terrible though

Why can't my eight year old sons make anything this awesome?

(Seriously though, this is great! Thanks for sharing!)
Meanwhile all I can make in Minecraft are little box houses.
That's cool. Too bad Minecraft is shit and overrun with toxic 12 year old children now. I remember when it used to be fun to play on faction servers in 2012.
U know what game that reminds me of?????

> [{quoted}](name=The Lexer,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=72e20iaQ,comment-id=000a0001,timestamp=2015-03-20T17:24:11.604+0000)
>
> U know what game that reminds me of?????

League of Legends?
Yes those use to be the good old days, when they didn't have all those X-ray mods and stuff....

You've got way too much time on your hands. But that's great, because then you can do cool stuff like this.
I wish I had too much time on my hands. D:

{{champion:268}} seal of approval.

SHURIMA!
Please...map download?
Nice one dude keep up if u had fun
im guessingg you are using the shaders mod?
Heliostorm. Your next project is to make a minecraft Zaun, Noxus, or any place within Valoran (preferably Zaun)

Hey, if you're still an active Minecraft player, I'd like to come in better contact with you.
What's the best way of talking with you?

I'm looking for your building skills, if you're wondering :P

> [{quoted}](name=Draghon,realm=EUW,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=72e20iaQ,comment-id=0022,timestamp=2015-04-21T12:50:59.212+0000)
>
> Hey, if you're still an active Minecraft player, I'd like to come in better contact with you.
> What's the best way of talking with you?
> 
> I'm looking for your building skills, if you're wondering :P

You can add me ingame if you want, or just communicating on Boards is fine too. If I don't add you back, it's probably because I mistook you for a level 1 account, so just send another one.

can u give a copy of your map plz plz plz? e-mail yasuohehe@yahoo.com

> [{quoted}](name=WUDIWEISUO,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=72e20iaQ,comment-id=0021,timestamp=2015-04-18T05:17:57.637+0000)
>

World download added to first post

> [{quoted}](name=VictimOfScience1,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=72e20iaQ,comment-id=001e,timestamp=2015-03-31T19:11:46.074+0000)
>
> Hey there - I'm a producer with the Riot produced LoL webshow /All Chat. We'd love to feature Minecraft Shurima in the community art and creation section of the show. Do you have any other videos or photos of the building process you can share? Or would you be willing to share your Worldedit file so we can get a few different angles and perspectives to show? We would need them before end of the week as the show tapes this Monday, 4/6. You can email me directly at nathanl@kornhaberbrown.com . Thanks!

I'm afraid I can't get the world file, but I should be able to get more screenshots. Would you prefer email or that I post them here?
If you can e-mail them to me, that'd be great! Thanks!

> [{quoted}](name=VictimOfScience1,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=72e20iaQ,comment-id=001e00000000,timestamp=2015-04-01T18:54:11.750+0000)
>
> If you can e-mail them to me, that'd be great! Thanks!

Sent

Construction:
http://i.imgur.com/B787XQs.png <- Was still trying to find a good texture pack for this one, so it's different from the rest of the screenshots. At this point the build was still rather small so I didn't have to use my modpack for screenshot taking, which expands the render distance to be able to see the entire thing, which is why this one doesn't have shaders while the rest do.

http://i.imgur.com/64jnDW1.png

http://i.imgur.com/mnIanAJ.png

http://i.imgur.com/kzEmI8M.png

http://i.imgur.com/qrOunv7.png

These were taken to help me scale and position the parts of the build, as well as editing the texture pack to make the sandstone closer to the color in the Shurima video; the final color is less reddish. I normally don't take screenshots while building, but because it's impossible to see the build in the way intended without using this particular combination of mods, I had to switch to this modpack in order to see if everything was where it was supposed to be. 

More completed screenshots:

http://i.imgur.com/IH617CE.png

http://i.imgur.com/ydX1mBl.png

http://i.imgur.com/E3Qsjxp.png
{{champion:268}} I am proud. I also do the buildings of the worlds, although I do it with broken back labor.

Is there anywhere one can download this build? I think it'd be a really cool thing to put in a massive desert, like... Half buried. That way people exploring can find the lost city of Shurima :P

... That and I just want dis. <3

So beautiful... and im here drawing pixelated logos of Riot Games logo...

I realized how bad i am in front of True creativity XD

AWESOME JOB THERE :D
Hey, can you put a world download link in your post?
You're missing the like 10 million soldiers that are on the cliffs ;)
but azir can only have 3 at a time. (at least until URF returns, {{champion:268}}  RISE MY ARMY AND DO MY BIDDING)
One time I made a house. Well, really it was just a shed with chests and a bed.
Nice job! Really impressed!!!! This must of took a long time.
Holy cow, that's awesome
Map download pls :D
Daaaaamn, this is really cool. :)
how long did it take?

> [{quoted}](name=DarthVader117,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=72e20iaQ,comment-id=0015,timestamp=2015-03-20T01:03:11.046+0000)
>
> how long did it take?

4 days, maybe like 12-ish hours total. The towers on either side of the Sun Disk were reused from a previous project though (that was merely Shurima-inspired as opposed to being Shurima), so I didn't have to make those again.
Wow, glory to Shurima. UPVOTED!
ITS....SO BEAUTIFUL IT MAKES ME WANNA CRY ;)
Woah....
"Wow, this is beautiful." Were my exact first words. Upvoted.
I really want this to be visually upgraded Dominion. Fuse the Ascension game mode into Dominion - a single, contestable buff in the middle.
That's fucking sweet!
Holy crap! How long did it take you to make this?!
Normally, I hate minecraft, but this... this is worthy of praise.
Now, time to make the other realms....:o..Minecrafters! UNITE!
